bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Abnormal Frequency Protection for Power Generating Plants
IEEE Guide for Abnormal Frequency Protection for Power Generating Plants
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C37.106-2003 (Revision of ANSI/IEEE C37.106-1987)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Supersedes C37.106-1987 (R1992). This guide has been prepared to assist the protection engineer in applying relays for the protection of generating plant equipment from damage caused by operation at abnormal frequencies including overexcitation.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
